sense.def:
To score in a game
pomeni dati gol ali doseči točko na tekmi.

seg.quote: Barnes scored from a distance of twenty feet.

sense.def:
The score in a game
je število zadetkov ali točk, ki jih na tekmi dosežejo moštva ali igralci.

To score a success, victory, or hit
pomeni doseči uspeh, zmago ali zadetek.

seg.quote: The Liberals have scored a dramatic victory in this by-election.

sense.def:
To score over someone
ali
to score a point
pomeni pridobiti prednost pred nekom ali ga tako ali drugače premagati.

seg.quote: The Government was anxious to score over the opposition in the education debate.
Gareth grinned, as if he had scored an important point.

sense.def:
Scores of things
je veliko število stvari.

To score a surface
pomeni, da oster predmet naredi razo v neko površino;

seg.quote: Each stone is scored with very thin grooves.

sense.def:
The score of a piece of music
je notni zapis glasbenega dela.

On this score
ali
on that score
pomeni glede na nekaj, kar je že bilo omenjeno;

seg.quote: There was no need for concern on that score.
